Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Kurt Voelker'], 'Producers': ['Bill Kiely', 'George Parra', 'Joseph McKelheer', 'Matthew Baer'], 'Starring': ['J.K. Simmons', 'Josh Wiggins', 'Odeya Rush'], 'Studio': ['Freestyle Digital Media']}
Review Text: This movie was well acted and beautifully written.  The characters are very real and easy to relate to.  The different perspectives about how people cope with the human condition was expressed well.
Review Title: Quality acting, nice story.
Rating: 5.0
